name: KARMA
description: KARMA Coin is designed to drive social change by rewarding positive actions. It leverages blockchain technology to provide users with a decentralized platform for supporting charities, volunteering, and environmental initiatives. KARMA token holders can vote to govern how the 1% trading fees are being used in supporting charitable causes aroudn the world. Karma token runs on Polygon netowrk, with low trading fees and contract ownership renounced to make sure it is fully decentralised.
